title: Unable to Connect: Black Screen after Champion Select
body:
Hi there, I've recently been getting an issue every time I start playing a League of Legends game. 

After Champion select, my game starts and I'm welcomed with a Black Screen without any champion icons. After a brief moment I hear a noise and minimise and re maximise my League to see an error that says the following. 

> **Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game.**

This is happening every single time I load into a game and I can't enter, the only way I've been able to connect to my games is by connecting to my mobile phone hotspot. But as you can imagine this chews threw a lot of my data and I can't keep this up for extended periods of time. Since just yesterday I chewed threw half my data usage.

Has anyone else had this issue and if so, **did you fix it? What did you do?** I would like to get this sorted so that I can continue playing. 

Thanks.

EDIT:**_ I tried Howling Abyss and Twisted Treeline and both of these maps work fine. It's only Summoner's Rift that's not working._**

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me.

Could I also get you to [download WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/) and run a traceroute to the following IP's (Allow this to sit for 5-15 minutes)

>103.240.227.5
>103.240.227.25

Export the results in a text file and attach them in an email to **oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com**, please also include a link to your thread in the email.
This error has been concluded and I'm being faced with an entirely new issue, I posted it with more information within this same sub-forum
